description: This file declares the OmiProxy class which implements the IOmiProxy interface. It provides methods to mount and unmount crypted bundles, register and unregister listeners, and is part of the omi namespace, indicating its role in a proxy component for OMI services.

classes.name: OmiProxy
classes.description: A class implementing the IOmiProxy interface with stub methods for managing crypted bundles and event listeners within the omi namespace.

methods.name: bool mountCryptedBundle(const std::string & id,const std::string & rootfs_file_path,const std::string & config_json_path,std::string & bundlePath)
methods.description: Attempts to mount a crypted bundle identified by 'id', using provided file paths. Currently a stub returning true.

methods.name: bool umountCryptedBundle(const std::string & id)
methods.description: Attempts to unmount a crypted bundle given its 'id'. Currently a stub returning true.

methods.name: long unsigned registerListener(const OmiErrorListener & listener,const void * cbParams)
methods.description: Registers an error listener and returns a tag identifier. Currently a stub returning 0.

methods.name: void unregisterListener(long unsigned tag)
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered listener identified by 'tag'.

ctags.name: mountCryptedBundle
ctags.signature: (const std::string & id,const std::string & rootfs_file_path,const std::string & config_json_path,std::string & bundlePath)

ctags.name: registerListener
ctags.pattern: /^    virtual long unsigned registerListener(const OmiErrorListener &listener, const void* cbParam/

ctags.name: umountCryptedBundle
ctags.pattern: /^    virtual bool umountCryptedBundle(const std::string& id) { return true; }$/
